    • chooseWorker

      public void chooseWorker​(Worker.IDs workerID)
      The player must perform all the actions of the turn with the same player so he has to choose one
      Parameters:
      workerID - the id of the worker chosen by the player at the start of the turn

      the current player is playing the turn

    • checkMoveDuringTurn

      public void checkMoveDuringTurn() throws DefeatException
      Check if the worker position is the same as the start of the turn
      Throws:
      DefeatException - if the player as not moved in the turn

    • validActions

      public java.util.List<int[]> validActions​(Worker.IDs workerID, TurnAction action)
      Calculate all the possible destination of an action of a specific worker passed both as parameters
      Parameters:
      workerID - the worker that perform the action
      action - the action to perform
      Returns:
      a list of all the possible move or build destination

    • getNumberOfMove

      public int getNumberOfMove()

    • getHasBuiltBeforeMove

      public boolean getHasBuiltBeforeMove()
      Returns:
      true if the player has built before moving, false otherwise

    • setHasBuiltBeforeMove
